title: Mini-Ep 65: Sunscreen and Wanderlust
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 65: Sunscreen and Wanderlust
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree swap affordable sunscreen tips, discuss self-care while your partner is away, and receive an email from a listener who feels a “phantom itch” for something more. Plus they share listener responses for the mother who wrote in about her yo...
description:
Kate and Doree swap affordable sunscreen tips, discuss self-care while your partner is away, and receive an email from a listener who feels a “phantom itch” for something more. Plus they share listener responses for the mother who wrote in about her young daughter getting compliments on her looks.


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • SpaceNK - To shop SpaceNK’s limited edition sets this summer, head to www.spacenk.com/forever35. 
  • Myro - Go to mymyro.com/forever35 promo code FOREVER35 to get 50% off your first order and get started today for just $5!
  • HelloFresh - For $80 off your first four boxes, visit hellofresh.com/forever80 and use promo code FOREVER80.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
